page.title: 04Parkstone Golf Course
page.content:
We found that the club was not owned by one person but it was owned by all the members.It is roughly sixty acres and originally belonged to the late Lord Anridare.It used to be used for pigeon shooting by the late Lord and he used to invite his friends to shoot.There are roughly one hundred and fifty male members,seventy juniors and one hundred female members. There are two large man made lakes. They tried to breed trout but the golfers used to bring their fishing rods. Soon there were no fish left. All a long the edge of the golf course are fire beaters just in case the golf course should catch fire in the hot summers.
{**cont. page 5**
